# This file is autogenerated
title: FailedToFindTransactionError
description: Overview of the FailedToFindTransactionError method
---

Constructs a new error message indicating a failure to find the transaction for the specified user operation hash.

<Note>
  `FailedToFindTransactionError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError
  for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { FailedToFindTransactionError } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Parameters

### hash

`Hex`
The hexadecimal value representing the user operation hash.
